HomeWiki:
Project Description
mRadio is a minimalistic webradio player that utilizes WMPlib.

3 German stations are predefined.

When adding a station you should target a m3u oder wpl (actually anything that the WMP would accept as a source)

The streams are saved in the user folder under AppData\Roaming\mRadio\streams.json


Uses:
https://github.com/MahApps/MahApps.Metro
http://json.codeplex.com/
